sense.def:
Safety
je stanje, ko nam ne preti nikakršna nevarnost.

seg.quote: He was assured of his daughter's safety.
They swam to the safety of a small, rocky island.

sense.def:
To be concerned about the safety of something
pomeni biti zaskrbljen, da nekaj ne bi bilo škodljivo ali nevarno.

seg.quote: People worry about the safety of nuclear energy.

sense.def:
Kadar so značilnosti ali ukrepi
safety
, naj bi bilo zaradi njih nekaj manj nevarno.

seg.quote: Every car will come with built-in safety features.
